description: This file defines a React component for the front-end page of a ride booking application. It handles booking form submission, displays booking confirmation, and renders a map placeholder.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component rendering the booking form, confirmation message, and map placeholder. Handles booking submissions and state management.

methods.name: handleBooking
methods.description: Asynchronous function called when a booking form is submitted. Creates a booking via API and updates the UI accordingly.
